website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking option that comes with both user-friendly features and some concerns that are typical of this type of product.
pros: Easy to place where you need it, as it comes with a rope to hang it
Ultrasonic level is easy to adjust and can reach a range of up to 50 feet
cons: May not work for all dogs, especially large, determined barkers
Only takes one 9V battery to operate, but it doesn't get long battery life

customer_reviews.title: NOT satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: I hung it outside facing the direction of the neighbor's dog (Great Pyrenees) barking. Turned it on 3 to make sure the distance would reach. The device has no effect at all on the dog's barking. Wasted my money!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: gk

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work at all!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t work at all for our dogs. If anything I think it is making them bark more. 100% would not recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn21

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy. Not Returnable...
customer_reviews.text: Does Not stop barking at all. I have four Chihuahuas, none of them are deaf or hard of hearing. My neighbors dog, 6' away continued to bark. Went to return it and found out this is a No Return!! If you are buying this based on reviews please be sure to look at them to confirm they are for this product and verified purchases. Just saying....
customer_reviews.author: Tbone

customer_reviews.title: No change at all
customer_reviews.text: I was really hopeful this would be our saving grace after reading all the positive reviews, but this device did nothing to prevent my dogs from barking. I put it on the highest setting and they could have cared less. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a 6 lb dogs this will work perfectly. Does not work on large animals at all. Doesnt deserve a star.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very dissapointed:( I have three dogs and not one of them is affected in the slightest by this device.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Wright

customer_reviews.title: Best dog product I have ever bought!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing!!! We live out in the country and have two Great Danes. These guys bark at everything, sometimes for hours on end. My husband told me I need to do something before our neighbors complain. I heard about this item from a coworker and decided to give it a try. It worked instantly. It has been so peaceful for two days so far! I hung it near their dog kennel and after an initial bark, they figured out what would happen if they barked. They are now model citizens! I can't believe it! Five stars for sure!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Mccartney

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Does not work for any of our dogs and was unaware it is ineligible for return! Horrible!! ZERO STARS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for my dogs. I have 2 small dogs, 1 spaniel mix and a maltipoo. My dogs noticed it the first day, but would just move further away from the machine and then begin to bark. I had it on the highest level and eventually they weren’t phased by this at all. I gave it to my aunt to try with her dogs, and it did not work for her either. Was not able to return even before the 30 days and feel like I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: This product works!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We used this indoors because our two little weasel dogs were barking at every little noise, and winding each other up - the first day we turned this on, barking was reduced by at least 90%. They bark less often, and for much less time when they do. This is one of the best purchases I've ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A miracle ♥️👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday...slammed a battery in it and put it on top of my bbq facing the back yard of the most annoying two dogs in the world. I haven't heard a peep in 24 hours!!! This thing is a god send and saved me from from a felony. No joke. Those dogs barked every minute for a year. Fk
customer_reviews.author: emmaeytcheson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth even one star
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing except the green/red light blinks. Have 4 dogs, 2 toy poodles, cocker spaniel, and dachshund. All 4 dogs can be standing next to the device barking and all it does is the lights blink. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Cole

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My neighbors have 2 big dogs that like to bark. A lot. I didn't want to go through another summer like last year, constantly irritated by them. I wasn't sure if we would be close enough for it to work but it does! As soon as they bark they look over and seem concerned then walk around to the other side of their house! It has only had to go off a few times and now they just don't bark!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly! It took less than 30 seconds and both my dogs AND my neighbors dogs stopped barking. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Christine G

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic
customer_reviews.text: My dog drove me and the neighbors crazy barking at leaves,squirrels,anything and everything. I was dubious that this would work but boy did it. I bought three and put them in her favorite bark spots and she immediately stopped barking. The only downside is that she now seems a little depressed as frankly barking was one of her biggest pleasures, but hopefully she will get over that.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbur

customer_reviews.title: 99% FIXED MY DOGS BARKING
customer_reviews.text: SEEMS TO WORK GREAT, MY ROOMMATE & NABORS LOVE THE DIFFERNCE & I LIKE NOT HAVING TO KEEP THE DOGGIE DOOR CLOSED WHEN I'M ASLEEP OR NOT AROUND
customer_reviews.author: japhet f wasserman

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: The neighbor has two rather large dogs that bark all the time. At least three times a day we get a very loud serenade. Every time I approach the fence they back non stop. Not any more! I placed the battery and hang it on a tree by the fence. These baritone dogs barked twice and that was it. For four days we have had no more hauling concerts. Never seen anything work this good before so I am just keeping my finger crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldo Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!! Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: This worked so well in just a few uses that we no longer have to for our VERY loud mutt that barks at any and everything that passes the window. We never went passed the first setting, no need really. We placed it in a few areas around the house that has low windows that the dog would hang out at but now he has learned to calmly enjoy the outside curiosities without rupturing our eardrums! Life saver. We even decided to place it in the back corner of our lot where the neighbors dog will bark straight for hours... he’s no longer barking at all hours of the night 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful addition to an apartment
customer_reviews.text: I got this as my mini aussie and I were moving into an apartment after her being in a house for over 8 years and barking not being an issue. It's small so doesn't stand out in the apartment. Works great, doesn't hurt her, and since it scares her a bit it makes her cuddle with me more LOL. When she barks, it goes off and she jumps up in the chair next to me and lays there tight with me shaking a bit, but I comfort her and tell her she's a good girl. I set it when I'm out so that she doesn't bark to cause a nuisance to the neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Learninggirl

customer_reviews.title: Works great, HOWEVER not all dog respond
customer_reviews.text: This works great, however, not all dogs respond the same. With three dogs in backyard, one was visiting, two stopped barking instantly, one could care less. It is like setting up a complicated pool shot, aim it carefully. I'm buying another one for a spot I cant hit on the other side of house
customer_reviews.author: Wonder bread

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! 3 different obnoxious dogs surrounding us.... this thing stops their barking after 1 bark!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JO mason

customer_reviews.title: Works on my lab and yorkie.
customer_reviews.text: I do wish it was rechargeable, however, it works like a charm to get my dogs to stop barking. I keep it on my covered porch and as soon as they start to bark they immediately stop. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing right out of the box!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I found this long ago! As soon as I put battery in it and took it outside It worked on one of my dogs that barks non stop at you when you go outside. She barked it beeped and she stopped. Tested again today went out front to fence where they bark as soon as they see something and not one of my five dogs made a peep. Sure my neighbors will be happy. We just turn it off when we leave so they will bark if someone comes on property. This is literally heaven in a box
customer_reviews.author: Boots

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. Bought it to train my pup not to bark every time someone comes to the door or walks by our house, and also to put in the yard to train my neighbor’s constant barker. Inside, it reacts to loud noises on tv/in movies, loud coughs or sneezes etc. so my dog gets the training sound when he’s doing nothing wrong. Outside, it works every time the neighbor’s dog barks, but also affects my dog inside through walls and windows (on lowest setting too). So, again my pup is being reprimanded when he’s not barking. Had to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: SB Ash

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a couple of days
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and have two barkers. After getting a couple of complaints, I was looking for a way to keep the noise down. I ordered this despite some mixed reviews, figuring it was worth a shot. It worked immediately! Unfortunately, however, it did not continue to work. Now the dogs don't appear to care at all and bark as they please, so I am left looking for an alternative. I think it's worth a shot, but I would hold onto that packaging so that if it stops working, you can send it back and get your money back.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Totally ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Set up on May 21st. Today, June 2nd and the neighbor's dog barks as much as ever, if not more. Also, with last night's rain, water entered the battery compartment. The brand new9V battery only lasted 9 days. AND NOW I FIND OUT THE DAMN COMPANY WILL NOT TAKE RETURNS. Edit: I do not know why it comes up as a can opener. My review is about PET CAREE Anti Barking Device, Ultrasonic Anti Barking, Sonic Bark Deterrents, Bark Control Device, Dog Bark Control Outdoor Birdhouse from VOOCO. I never bought a can opener
customer_reviews.author: I. A.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all on barking.
customer_reviews.text: Neither my dogs nor neighbors dogs seem to care at all about this thing. They do not even notice it is supposedly working. I thought I would try it and return if it doesn't work but apparently Amazon won't let you return it either so now I'm out 40 dollars for piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Satterfield

customer_reviews.title: Works for some dogs, but not all!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great with dogs that are stopped by sound. I watch dogs at my house and can't have them barking at the neighbors, so I got this to stop that. It works for some dogs, but others just are too scared/protective/hard headed to care. I know it works as I have a husky that is sensitive to the noise and when another dog barks he gets away from the anti barking device. Anyway, I rated it 5 stars because it isn't the device/device sellers fault that some dogs are immune/just don't care. It works great for the dogs that do care.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for a black Lab.
customer_reviews.text: Used for three months to try to stop a black Lab next door from barking. Did not even phase the dog. Repositioned each month. Went thru 6 batteries. Tested device monthly and appeared to be working.
customer_reviews.author: De2595

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I have had this now for over a month and it does not deter my neighbor dogs at all. I have mounted 3 feet off ground and 10 feet from Neighbor's chain link fence and the 3 dogs they have still bark continuously. Even when we are inside the house they bark. I know the device is working as the red light comes on whenever any of them bark. Wish I had something that could zap them from my side or that would do a better job of shutting them up as Neighbor's will not do anything and do not believe in shock collars, which I have seen to do a great job!!!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Wardle

customer_reviews.title: Stops barking
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my doodle from barking. I haven’t had it stop working from the rain yet but water does leak out after a strong storm so I’m curious how weather resistant it really is. That being said it’s been a couple of months and we’ve had some storms and so far it’s still working. I have a small/medium fenced yard and would probably have better results with on one each side of the yard.
customer_reviews.author: ScubaGuySouthFL

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought a square birdhouse dog anti bark a while ago and it worked great. I bought this because it has a bunch of high reviews. IT IS TRASH!!! and I can not return it even though I bought it through prime. TOTAL RIPOFF. Do not buy this and I will be contacting Amazon about how something is sold through Prime but can not be returned.
customer_reviews.author: evan caldwell

customer_reviews.title: cute but works
customer_reviews.text: i doubted this product but my dog goes outside now and does a tiny bark i guess to see if it goes off then totally stops barking. i’ve had for few wks and still works. batteries need replacing every couple weeks if you leave it on all the time
customer_reviews.author: dims

customer_reviews.title: Worked on a boxer.
customer_reviews.text: It worked wonders! Neighbors stopped letting their dog out at night. Shortly after, a moving truck appeared in their driveway. Coincidences? I think not! It worked instantly. Neighbor's dog stopped barking when on and resumed again when off. I think wind might affect the efficacy.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond E. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Really does work.
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical... very skeptical, but it turns out this has changed our lives. our dog would run along the fence and bark at joggers until they were out of sight. Day 1, resolved this behavior. Maybe I'm lucky and have a smart dog that learns quickly, but it really did solve my problem. Even if it didn't work, it's not like it was going to break the bank 😁
customer_reviews.author: Pk9192

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this product to work. I have a poodle who is very yippy whenever he hears the slightest sound and it wakes my daughter from her naps! We were using the pet corrector and that worked but it was getting cumbersome to carry everywhere in the house. When we read all of the great reviews for this product we couldn't wait to try it! Unfortunately, our pup went completely unbothered and continued barking. I was really disappointed that despite it not working, were unable to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Internicola

customer_reviews.title: Save your money I have a calming pills or a bark collar
customer_reviews.text: Thank gosh Amazon refunded me because my seller does not! This product was a joke probably made my dogs bark more there was no change I think you pay for basically a blinking lights and makes you think somethings happening but nothings really happening except the plastic bird looking house hanging in your yard with the flashing green light through the night! Save your money by the calming pills or a bark collar !
customer_reviews.author: Just-can't-stop-shop

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: The "PET CAREE Anti Barking Device, Ultrasonic Anti Barking, Sonic Bark Deterrents, Bark Control Device" DOES NOT WORK & is a waste of money. I purchased this hoping it would help with the dogs barking in the yard but it did nothing. Then I tried to return it and they denied me returning just 2 days after I purchased this $40 gadget. When selecting it & purchasing it there wasn't a single thing that stated anywhere that all sales were final, sales not returnable or any disclaimer at that. I work hard for my money and I do not appreciate them stealing my $40 bucks from me. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS ITEM Sold by: VOOCO
customer_reviews.author: Mel S

customer_reviews.title: Shorted out after a month
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product is a dud. We replaced the battery thinking that would fix it, and it did not. The tone that would sound when we first received it is now a fuzzy buzz, not the tone it used to be. The pups bark at the door now. Defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Lusby

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: It works great on my 52lb male greyhound/lab mix, my 15lb male cat and so-so on my 70lb lab/pit mix. Barking is down by 75-80%. Now that they can hear me our training progress has taken a huge jump forward as well. Also, it looks good hanging in the tree and I have happier neighbors!
customer_reviews.author: Rahni

customer_reviews.title: Really read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work for my dog and if you read the reviews there are some for coffee, water bottles and corner protectors.....what the heck?
customer_reviews.author: donnani4os

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work AT ALL. We live very close to our neighbors and it did not deter their 2 barking dogs at all. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MEG

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, it does not work.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and followed instructions for placement/ setup. It seemed to work for about 2 days, but that was it. The lights go on and off with the barking. My dog is not a barker - but when the neighbor dog starts barking- my dog runs over to the dog house and just tilts her head and looks at it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Bransky

customer_reviews.title: Finally....peace and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Put this out, and the dog barks once or twice, then it stops immediately. Glad I can enjoy my bon Fire in peace. Con: The blinking Green light in the back of this unit that faces toward the area that you will be in blinks constantly, and it is really bright at night if you live in a rural area. i have to have to cover it up with electrical tape or something...not very “discreet” at night
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I guess after a month of it being out side the dogs bark about 1/3 less, but we are still going out on the deck and bringing them in. I would like to have 3 barks at a squirrel and that be it. I think that will every happen
customer_reviews.author: AnnHennessy

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Work For Me but Might in a Different Home
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work for me. I’m in a condo and the downstairs neighbor has dogs who bark non-stop. Other noises don’t make it through the floor, just the barking. So, the barking device sound may not be making it back through to them.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: maybe it works?
customer_reviews.text: At first when I hung this outside probably 50 ft away from my neighbor's open window dog it SEEMED to work. But now the dog doesn't care. So maybe the birds will carve it into a cute house.
customer_reviews.author: nxtkitt

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all. My dogs could not have cared less about this thing. They are small dogs so I thought it would stop the barking.....didn't even slow them down.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaF8

customer_reviews.title: Not for Beagles I guess
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the reviews were so great. My beagle pup however did not respond to it .
customer_reviews.author: Aupriann Myers

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all for my big dog. The little dog seemed to be affected by it but the big dog is the one that barks at everything and anything. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Tino

customer_reviews.title: Dog still barking
customer_reviews.text: Dont work and they dont accept returns Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Erika Fritts

customer_reviews.title: It works good
customer_reviews.text: I really like this however it blinks very often and very bright from the back to let you know it is working. I really don’t think you need this feature
customer_reviews.author: Mailboxpmt

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste you’re money. Your dog will persevere.
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked great for a couple of days then stopped. Changed the battery and found out the dog got used to the buzz and could care less. Daughter is happy with her “bird house”.
customer_reviews.author: jjarec12

customer_reviews.title: Worked initially for an hour or two, then dog ignored it
customer_reviews.text: I have a boston terrier. She reacted to it the first time I put it out, so I know it works and she heard the noise, but it did not ultimately deter her from barking.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Snyder

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so very disappointed in this product. Did not work even once. Tried everything to make it work. Even put it right in front of my dog while he was barking and literally nothing happened. And you can't even return the piece of junk. Just a waste of money plain and simple. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: April Walker

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for our dog! Some people may have success... not our King Charles Cavalier! Continues to bark! (Worked at first ... after a week ...back to barking)
customer_reviews.author: Frenchie

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION  in pets with any level of anxiety.
customer_reviews.text: This product did work for the two that bark. They stopped. My third dog that doesn't bark is now terrified to go into the yard. I need to go out with him, even then if the girls bark he cowers and runs for the door. Now, not only do I need to find d an alternative for the barkers, but now I need to work on my boy that is terrified to go out.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Costello

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for us.
customer_reviews.text: This product simply just does not work. It picks up to many other sounds and goes off. The dogs are not even fazed by it. Battery life is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Southern

customer_reviews.title: This does not work. Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this would help. It doesn't. Both my German Shepherd and my Chihuahua bark right at it towards the neighbors fence.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Update review... I stopped working I only had it a few weeks and now it don’t work!!! Worked right away I have a neighbor dog that barks no matter what we do.. go this he came to the fence barked 2 different times and now he sits and watches us no barking it’s amazing
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Battery Last Close to Nothing
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasted less than a week and even with fresh ones it did NOT deter my dog from barking... NO GO!
customer_reviews.author: Hugo A. Franzani

customer_reviews.title: Does absolutely nothing to deter crazy neighbors dogs.
customer_reviews.text: All of our neighbors’ dogs go crazy every time we set foot in our back yard. We followed the directions exactly on this product. We change the battery every month when we see the light not working. We are now on level 3 and the dogs are still going crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like that you  need to be right in front for it to go off
customer_reviews.text: I can only rate the noise level a 3. Worked once then the dog will now continue to bark. I see the red light go off but isn’t affecting him. I haven’t tried it outside. I was looking for a device to be used inside at my front door to get my standard poodle to stop barking at everything and everyone walking by. Only work once now he’s back barking
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Batteries drain quick
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t work with my dog doesn’t mean it won’t work for other dogs, but the battery life is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Didn’t phase the constant barking dogs one bit! Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: tish

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick
customer_reviews.text: Its shutting up the yelpers next door, they don't hang out by our fence and yelp all day anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Bozoki

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t work at all. I received this product Wednesday 29 May and it doesn’t work at all. I thought I’d give it a few days to make sure...knowing I could return it. Well after 3 days I just now went to select return and YOU CANT RETURN THIS ITEM!!! I’m so upset. This is the second dog No Barking mechanisms I have bought that doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Jackilene J. Beaman

customer_reviews.title: when i used iteam it's doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: when i get iteam,i used it. but i doesn't work. my dog still brake. It’s very easy to use on the Internet, but after buying it, it’s not the same as saying it on the Internet. It took 2 days to throw it.
customer_reviews.author: O.D.Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money - Doesnt work and cant return it!
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work at all on our lab. She actually barks at it. Tried turning it up and down and nothing. Really upset it cant be returned??? Not understand that!
customer_reviews.author: T. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Nothing yet
customer_reviews.text: Hoped it would stop the barking. No real difference. Been about a month or so
customer_reviews.author: DavidHuff

customer_reviews.title: Completely worthless. Most positive reviews aren’t even for this product!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item to quiet down and old dog, and teach puppies not to bark. This piece of crap won’t even stop a puppy from barking when it sits on top of the table or crate 3 feet from the dog. Worse yet: not returnable! I took the chance figuring I’d return it if it doesn’t perform. Flushed $30 down the drain!!! Junk.
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY S PROWSE

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Does not stop any of the neighbors dogs from barking.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Stay away.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of trash. DO NOT BUY. usual amazon return policy doesn’t apply to this garbage. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton B Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: May not work on your dog
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work on my dog at all, even on highest setting and battery died fast even when turned off except when he went out to potty
customer_reviews.author: SaraG

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up and use however it doesn't work at all. My dogs bark right next to. Didnt stop them for a second. It's like it's not even there. I can hear it go off but has no effect.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely does not work. Furthermore, you cannot return this item. Buyer beware. Do not purchase. Unless you just want an ugly, expensive lawn ornament.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Acker

customer_reviews.title: Does not help my 2 toy maltese from barking
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this product to help my two 4 and 5 lb maltese stop barking. i turned it on low to begin and nothing changed. I turned it up and up and eventually all the way up.. and they continued to bark as usual. I was out of town and realized today.. I missed the return period. I just threw away $35. Learn from my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Reem Trahan

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Although this item was easy to assemble, it DID NOT stop my dog from barking. We moved to around in our yard thinking it was too far away, but there was no change. We adjusted the settings and nothing. It was functioning properly (light on,, etc) but did not reduce or stop our dog from barking. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: ACM

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dyer barking.
customer_reviews.text: Has NO effect on barking. It’s just a dust collector
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Tysver

customer_reviews.title: Did not work on my dogs at all.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work at all on my dogs. I even ran the test to make sure it was working. Very disappointed. And I was unable to return it even though I bought it through Amazon. (I will not buy anything anymore that is not Prime with Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Kim C.

customer_reviews.title: No impact
customer_reviews.text: It's still blinking, so its on, but had no impact on my dogs' barking, lab and pitmix. Sorely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jillmariemoore

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Did not work on my neighbor's dogs at all, but be fair, they were incorrigible to begin with. Might work better on other dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Does not seem to work. Read the instructions and and tried the three different ranges. To no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the first week or two. Now I have a plastic bark stopper that confuses the birds. The neighbor's dogs are used to it, changed batteries, lights work but that's all. From 6:30 am-9:45 pm, 3 hound dogs bark as I work from home. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Set it up in the house so my dogs won’t alert at absolutely everything. It keeps the barking to a minimum. They will still go crazy on occasion. I also haven’t ever set it higher then 2.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Aaron Lindgren

customer_reviews.title: What dogs barking?!?!
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing!!! The neighbors dogs barked all day and all night right by my bedroom window until we bought this charm.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: No change in barking. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work at all. I have tried all levels, moved it to different places in the back yard following directions and still nothing. Doesn't work on mine or thw neighbors dogs. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amy N

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted three weeks before it stopped making the noise. This product was made cheap and it’s unfortunate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This works great as long as the area your putting it in is not loud. Otherwise the dogs get used to the noise and then it doesn’t work like it should. If you have a large yard you will need more than one.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Preston

customer_reviews.title: Great Bark off Product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to help a ton with our neighbors dog barking at our Dog. We hardly hear them bark any more.
customer_reviews.author: Justie

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and my 2 small dogs bark as much as they always did. Apparently, it doesn't phase them one bit. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Matt Laliberte

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work. My roommates dog barks his face off still!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Scared my dog too much!
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely made my dogs stop barking. It scared one of them so much that he didn’t come out from under the bed for a week. Even after I took the device out of the house, my dog was still terrified to come out of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well.
customer_reviews.text: The barking has been tempered since this has been up in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does not work at all
customer_reviews.text: Did not work from day 1. the dogs continue to bark without any change.
customer_reviews.author: Misty T.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work at first, but now the dog still barks. I’ve changed the battery and the lights come on, but dog still barks.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Morrison

customer_reviews.title: no good
customer_reviews.text: this product does not work so save your money my neighbor dog still barks and I have it on the highest setting and the dog is about 10-15 feet away from it. I wasted money on this item
customer_reviews.author: S Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Does not work.... at all - pay attention to all the other reviews ... I should have!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stop barking. Don’t waste your money or time.
customer_reviews.text: This does not stop your dog from barking. They will not even notice anything happening and continue on with their barking at all things.
customer_reviews.author: NE

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it’s even working
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t seem to be working at all, my dogs still bark and don’t seem to notice any kind of sound. There is a greeen light that blinks but otherwise I have no idea if the thing is even working
customer_reviews.author: nicole

product_meta.title: instecho Electric Can Opener, Restaurant can Opener, Smooth Edge Automatic Electric Can Opener! Chef's Best Choice
product_meta.description: instecho Electric Can Opener for Arthritis Individuals, Seniors (2018-New-wine) Note on proper use: 1) Use all new (2 new batteries required) high quality AA batteries, preferably Duracell, Energizer, or Basics. Cheaper less quality new batteries are inadequate and may not preform as necessary. 2) After completely revolving around the can and cutting the edge, the can will still appear to be sealed. After prying up the lid will it be evident that the can and its resealable lid are detached. 3) When soiled after use, wipe down blade with damp cloth and dry. 4) Do not lift or forcefully remove the can opener from the can while it is operational. Forceful removal can cause damage to the knife-edge.
feature_bullets: Durable and weatherproof: deter your own dog or your neighbour's dog from barking
Adjustable ultrasonic level control: safe for small Medium Large dogs. Emits harmless, but effective sound to control excessive barking
Hanging rope included: Designed to hang/mount on a tree, wall or fence post to keep your own dog or your neighbors dog from barking. Hanging rope included
Effective range up to 50 feet: outdoor bark control is automatically activated when it detects barks up to 50 feet away. It then emits ultrasonic sound.
Device 100% safe, humane and professional way to train your dog to stop barking

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.3 out of 5 stars238 ratings2.3 out of 5 stars
